      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Broker EntityManagerImpl.getBroker()
      Broker delegate.
      static Broker OpenJPAPersistence.toBroker(EntityManager em)
      Deprecated. 
      use JPAFacadeHelper instead. This method pierces the published-API boundary, as does the JPAFacadeHelper utilization.
      static Broker JPAFacadeHelper.toBroker(EntityManager em)
      Return the underlying broker for the given entity manager facade.

      use JPAFacadeHelper instead. This method pierces the published-API boundary, as does the JPAFacadeHelper utilization.
      static OpenJPAEntityManager JPAFacadeHelper.toEntityManager(Broker broker)
      Return a persistence manager facade to the given broker retaining previously associated persistence context type.
